original_text:
And I was soon in serious trouble
    in the assembly of God’s people.”
korean_text: 많은 무리들이 모인 중에서 큰 악에 빠지게 되었노라 하게 될까 염려하노라

sentences.original_text: And I was soon in serious trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 곧 심각한 곤경에 빠졌다

sentences.original_text: in the assembly of God's people
